subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds hit his 747th home run last night in the San Francisco Giants’ 4-3 victory against the visiting Toronto Blue Jays. The two-run shot was his first of the month and only his second since May 8.
snippet: Barry Bonds hit his 747th home run last night in the San Francisco Giants’ 4-3 victory against the visiting Toronto Blue Jays. The two-run shot was his first of the month and only his second since May 8.
